alert.note: Alert for Boundary (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 15 at 10:38PM MDT until further notice by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Idaho, including the following county, Boundary. * WHEN...Until 1230 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 936 PM PDT, Trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms with 0.76 inches of rain falling in 45 minutes in Bonners Ferry. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bonners Ferry and Moyie Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
